name: Navigation Tour
description: A tour through all the application tabs

steps.title: Welcome to RVCAT-WEB!
steps.description: This tutorial will show you the different parts of the application. Let's start with the Simulation tab.

steps.title: Simulation Tab
steps.description: Here you can run simulations of your code. This is the main tab of the application.

steps.title: Save execution
steps.description: Click the button 'Save' to save the current execution to the comparison tab.

steps.title: Comparison Tab
steps.description: Here you can compare saved executions to analyze performance differences.

steps.title: Static Analysis
steps.description: In this tab you can perform static analysis of your code to detect potential issues.

steps.title: Timeline
steps.description: The Timeline tab allows you to see the temporal evolution of program execution.

steps.title: Processor Settings
steps.description: Here you can configure processor parameters for simulations.

steps.title: Program Editor
steps.description: Here you can write and edit your programs for simulation.

steps.title: Tutorial Complete!
steps.description: You have completed the navigation tour. Now you know all the main parts of the application.
